comment._content: John Mitchel, Mayor of New York City, January 1, 1914 – December 31, 1917 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Purroy_Mitchel and Christy Mathewson, legendary pitcher for the New York Giants. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christy_Mathewson Likely taken at Opening Day at the Polo Grounds, 4-14-15.
